description: This cocktail is made from a complex blend of cold-pressed carrot juice,&nbsp;spiced rum, brown sugar, ginger beer, mint, and lime. It’s a refreshing drink for your summer parties!
keywords: Recipe for Carrot and Ginger Beer cocktail
name: Carrot-Ginger Beer
recipeIngredient: 3 cups Ginger beer, chilled and divided

recipeInstructions.name: In a small saucepan, combine water, brown sugar, and mint sprigs to make mint syrup.
recipeInstructions.text: In a small saucepan, combine water, brown sugar, and mint sprigs to make mint syrup.

recipeInstructions.name: Bring to a boil over medium heat, while stirring just until sugar dissolves. Remove from heat and let this syrup cool completely. You can discard the mint sprigs after.
recipeInstructions.text: Bring to a boil over medium heat, while stirring just until sugar dissolves. Remove from heat and let this syrup cool completely. You can discard the mint sprigs after.

recipeInstructions.name: In a pitcher, mix mint syrup, carrot juice, and lime juice. Chill for 2 hours.
recipeInstructions.text: In a pitcher, mix mint syrup, carrot juice, and lime juice. Chill for 2 hours.

recipeInstructions.name: Prepare several glasses. For each glass with ice, pour 6 tablespoons of the mixture and 3 tablespoons of spiced rum. Add ¾ cup of chilled ginger beer.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish it with mint sprigs. Enjoy!
